AI Description: cryptsetup is a utility used to conveniently set up disk encryption based on the Dm-crypt kernel module. It allows users to easily configure encrypted block devices using LUKS (Linux Unified Key Setup), manage cryptographic volumes, and interact with encrypted volumes.
Core Features: Disk Encryption Setup, Luks Support, Cryptographic Volume Management, Interaction With Encrypted Volumes
General Tags: Disk Encryption, Data Security, Cryptography, Linux
